channel.title: coins on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in coins on Barefoot Rob

item.title: seven b anthony
item.description: 10:15pm Monday 8 February 1999 (transcribed from my diary) Today I felt pretty unproductive. I wrote the following in my diary during Project Heart: I'm having a crappy day because I didn't go outside even one single time and just sat in front of the computer and did some email and scanned Houston Rally pictures but didn't really get important stuff done. I did my budget a bit and updated MR Labs website a bit but it doesn't work.

item.title: susan b anthony
item.description: 31 January 1999 Today Manda and I found a really cool thing at the post office. For a long time, they’ve had a stamp vending machine that takes bills (20s, 10s, 5s, 1s) and coins (quarters, dimes, nickels, pennies, and susan b anthony dollars). Some weeks ago, I found that I could purchase stamps with only pennies, a great way to spend them, and keep from having to roll them!
